resources.string:
"This app isn't about death.

" "It's just the opposite.


"
"We (the app's creators) want to live

" "and live tremendously. In an ocean

" "of options for how we spend our

" "days, we often need to be reminded

" "of what a minute or an hour are

" "really worth.


"
"This app comes out of the desire to

" "learn how to properly value a scarce

" "resource... our time.

" "Our phones usually "just kill time," but

" "we wanted our phones to help 

" "to redeem it, to use it better.

" "We want to live on purpose. 


" "Your time is ticking, too. 

" "We hope you'll live abundantly.
"
